body: Elen, I think they meant “mainly” instead of “manly” but got autocorrected.
@shownowmercy How tf is she manly. Do you know what that word means?
Honestly annoys me that this drawing talent goes for manly futas dominating girly boys. Some of their futa-on-girl (alebeit scarce) work is fantastic!

Yet again the admin is stupid with the tag lmfao.
I will educate you admin/publisher  :


- Futanari : Girl with Dick + Pussy.
- Dick Girl / Shemale : Girl with Dick (No pussy, has tits, also known as transgender, in the past they're possibly a male [that's why they have dick and no pussy despite being girl] ).
- Trap : a Beta Male that pretend to be a Girl ( Has dick, is a male [despite girlish appearance], act like a girl [despite being a male]).

I think this one is part of a series, if you're into the futanari stuff it might be worth to check it out. The ahegao is nuts! One of the best I've seen in a long time. Great art style, nice translation. You can't go wrong with Futanari x Trap 11/10
